functions.name: review_diff
functions.description: Review a unified diff and select hunks to apply or rework.

number.description: Index of the hunk in the diff. Starts from 1.

reason.description: Reason for applying or ignoring this hunk, or for asking for it to be reworked.

decision.description: Whether to apply this hunk, rework, or ignore it.

hunks.reason: The hunk incorrectly concatenates the MONGODB_URI variable instead of adding a new line for the PORT variable. This mistake would cause the .env file to malfunction by not properly defining the PORT variable.

response.review_notes: The intention to add a PORT variable is correct and necessary for the task. However, the implementation needs correction to ensure both MONGODB_URI and PORT variables are correctly defined on separate lines.
